summary: This bill, the FDA Modernization Act 3.0, mandates the Secretary of Health and Human Services to publish an interim final rule. This rule aims to replace references to animal testing in the Code of Federal Regulations with references to nonclinical testing, reflecting amendments made in the Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2023. The bill also includes a technical amendment to section 505 of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act.
